Method of Treatment

Now that we have discussed the cause of this disease and its prognosis, it remains for us to consider its prevention and cure.

In sofar, then, as the cause of this disorder consists in obstruction ol the spinal marrow, and weakness of the nerves thence arising, the chief indications both ol prevention and cure are that the nerves be strength· ened and the obstructions prevented or removed.
